content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Maria. As a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my returns on investment. I believe that we can arrive at a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to offer for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to offer 1000 Euros per month. Is that a reasonable offer?

I want to be on good terms with you and I am dependable and responsible. I can pay rent on time and in full every month. I hope you can consider my offer.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month, I must say that I believe I can do better. My goal as a landlord is to maximize my returns on investment, and I am confident that I can find a rental price that reflects that. I would be happy to discuss further if you are open to negotiating.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month. I hope that this offer is acceptable to you. Thank you for your time and consideration.

I am dependable and responsible, and I will pay rent on time and in full every month. I hope you can consider my offer.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to accept the price of 1200 Euros per month, Maria. I am pleased to hear that you are a dependable and responsible tenant and I am confident that you will pay rent on time and in full every month. I agree to the terms of our agreement and I look forward to our mutual success.
name: Heinrich Heine
